doc.previous: In addition to its wholly owned international operations Bristow Group maintains service agreements and equity interests in helicopter operators in Brazil Canada Colombia Egypt Kazakhstan Turkmenistan Mexico Norway and Russia Sakhalin and the United Kingdom This allows Bristow to extend its range of services into new and developing oil and gas markets and helps provide a lower cost structure in some operating areas Partners include
